item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Report on extortion case: Rick Pitino admits to sex
item.description: Louisville coach Rick Pitino reportedly told police that he had consensual sex with the woman who has been charged with trying to extort him.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Milwaukee Brewers send J.J. Hardy to minors, designate Bill Hall, fire pitching coach Bill Castro
item.description: The slumping Brewers have sent former All-Star shortstop J.J. Hardy to the minors, given up on third baseman Bill Hall and fired pitching coach Bill Castro.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: New York Yankees pitcher Joba Chamberlain to make next start on seven days' rest
item.description: Joba Chamberlain's next start will be on seven days' rest as the Yankees try to limit his work in his first full season in the rotation.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Ex-NFL running back Lawrence Phillips convicted of 7 felony counts
item.description: Former NFL running back Lawrence Phillips has been convicted of assault and other felony charges in San Diego.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Houston Texans linebacker Brian Cushing to miss preseason opener with injury
item.description: The Houston Texans' top draft pick, linebacker Brian Cushing, won't play in Saturday's preseason opener against the Chiefs because of a left knee injury.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: NBA Free Agents: Ben Wallace signs with Detroit Pistons, says he was close to retiring
item.description: Ben Wallace says he was very close to retiring before deciding to rejoin the Detroit Pistons.

item.dc:creator: Reuters
item.title: Colin Montgomerie says feud with Sandy Lyle is over
item.description: European Ryder Cup captain Colin Montgomerie said on Wednesday his lingering verbal spat with fellow Briton Sandy Lyle was finally over.

item.dc:creator: Tim Griffin
item.title: Oklahoma State freshman Joe Mitchell sent home amid high school grades probe
item.description: Oklahoma State freshman safety Joe Mitchell has been sent home amid allegations that coaches at his high school might have tampered with his academic transcripts.

item.dc:creator: Marc Stein
item.title: New Orleans Hornets trade Rasual Butler to Los Angeles Clippers
item.description: The New Orleans Hornets, in a move to shed some payroll after the recent acquisiton of Emeka Okafor, have agreed to trade swingman Rasual Butler to the Los Angeles Clippers for a future second-round pick, according to NBA front-office sources.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Michael Vick's adviser, agent believe signing may come soon
item.description: Michael Vick's personal adviser and his agent believe his return to the NFL is now not a question if "if," but "when" -- and that "when" may come soon.
